item.description:
Hello all,

For those that are off on President's day - Let's take the yearly trip to Dave and Busters in Providence. What's Dave and Buster's?,  well someone dubbed it the Chuck-e-Cheese for adults. There is a restaurant, arcade and bar. Let's meet at my place 163 S Main St Colchester and carpool on up.  I'm thinking meet me at 11 at my place - we can go up there, eat lunch there and hang out for a few hours play some games have some fun. or we can plan to meet there directly around noonish. The meals average about $10.00 - $15.00 and the game play is up to you. If you do not have a power card you get one for $1.00 and then charge it up however you want. You can use it later on another time that you go to any D&B nationally.

I hope to have some fun hanging out Monday playing House of the dead 4 and the pony races. :)

Margaret
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Margaret's and carpool - or cell phone each other when we get there

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: President's day - Dave and Buster's Providence place mall.
